objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver Exquisite Design
Perfect Gift for Her Special Moments
Authenticity Certificate Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a product advertisement with a soft, elegant aesthetic tailored for jewelry. The centered **product_image** layer features a pair of rose gold wreath stud earrings. Above it, the **heading** layer uses bold typography to establish the brand or mood. Just below, the **subheading** highlights the product name in a distinct, art-deco styled font. A **description** block offers details about the materials and certification in a clean sans-serif font. The **price** is prominently placed at the bottom left, and adjacent to it is a defined **cta_button** with a “SHOP NOW” **cta** text inside. The whole design is framed within dual rounded border rectangles and abstract wave lines for a refined and soft contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Pale Blush (#FDF4F2)
- Warm Rose (#D27D6C)
- Soft Peach (#E8A189)
- Deep Mulberry (#59202D)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings adorned with translucent crystals and a soft rose gold base. The dominant color palette includes a pastel rose gold (#F4A6A6), shimmering white for the crystals (#FFFFFF), and subtle silvery tones (#D8D8D8) that enhance the brilliance of the gems. Rose gold is used as the frame and accent, lending warmth and luxury, while the white crystals provide high contrast and sparkle. The colors are smoothly blended, with the metal reflecting light and enhancing the clarity of the stones, yet each element retains its distinct shine. This balance creates an eye-catching yet harmonious visual appeal.
